nqt.title: NQT
text.autoconfig.nqt.title: NotCoded's Quality Tweaks
text.autoconfig.nqt.option.isEnabled.@To: This decides if the mod is enabled.
text.autoconfig.nqt.option.optionsMenu.@: This decides if the button in the options menu is shown.
text.autoconfig.nqt.option.performance.n: No client world entity collision checks
Disables client world entity collision checks.
text.autoconfig.nqt.option.fixes.entityC: Avoid crashing the game because of erroring entities. (USE AS A LAST RESORT!)
text.autoconfig.nqt.option.fixes.titleFi: Fixes titles going off-screen aka. making the title fit on screen at all times.
text.autoconfig.nqt.option.fixes.cursorC: Fixes the cursor centering issue that occasionally happens when opening a GUI.
text.autoconfig.nqt.option.qol.dontClear: Doesn't clear chat history upon disconnecting from/connecting to a server
text.autoconfig.nqt.option.fog.disableAl: Disables ALL fogs (overworld, nether, end, sky fog, terrain fog)
text.autoconfig.nqt.option.fog.disableSk: Disables the Fog in the sky
text.autoconfig.nqt.option.fog.disableTe: Disables the Fog in the terrain.
text.autoconfig.nqt.option.fog.disableNe: Disables Fog in the nether dimension.
text.autoconfig.nqt.option.fog.disableOv: Disables Fog in the overworld dimension.
text.autoconfig.nqt.option.fog.disableEn: Disables Fog in the end dimension.
text.autoconfig.nqt.option.fixes.chatLag: Fixes the chat lag whenever checking if you blocked the player (basically disables it).
text.autoconfig.nqt.option.qol.gamemodeS: Allows you to use the gamemode switcher without needing to be op-ed.
text.autoconfig.nqt.option.qol.lowerCase: Forces the first argument of any command to be lowercase. (/HI -> /hi)
